committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to designate certain National Forest System lands in the State of Texas as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System.

summary.text: Designates the following national forest system lands in Texas as wilderness: (1) the Little Lake Creek Wilderness in the Sam Houston National Forest; (2) the Big Slough Wilderness in the Davy Crockett National Forest; and (3) the Turkey Hill Wilderness in the Angelina National Forest.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain National Forest System lands in the State of Texas as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System.
